Articles.Content: When i try to download, i try to open it, it can't open as archive, i use 7-zip as a file opener. I have no problems with 0.24

Were going to need a bit more info... Check this thread out

With the current information, I would say that the zip file has corrupted in some way or another while downloading it or transferring it. Somehow it seems to have become corrupted. I would recommend re-downloading KSP from the store site, and try opening it again.

Cheers,

ToTheMun
